WRITING.TITLE: The "Does _____ End in a cliff hanger" thread, so people can find out, does this show they want to watch get cancelled on a Cliff Hanger?
WRITING.TEXT:
I figured, it might be handy to have something like this.
You see, if I had of known Jericho, and AMAZING show, ended on a cliff hanger, I'd probably not have watched it. Because I've been left wanting so much more!
So the idea of this thread is, if you know a cancelled T.V series write
"Does *SHOW* end in a cliff hanger" Then add yes or no. Only finished or cancelled series please.
So that way, if someone googles that phrase, they can find it. You can also ask this question in this thread and hopefully someone will be able to answer you in this format.
For me, I am curious. "Does Sleepy Hollow end in a cliff hanger?"

WRITING.TITLE: Hi guys, I cannot find a spoiler free question to the awnser, "Does Sleepy Hollow end in a cliff hanger" I know it's only four seasons, but will I be left wanting more if I want to watch it?

That's fine, anyone who is getting persnickety about this needs to stop and think.
They aren't making it sex neutral, the baby will still be male or female, they're just making it easier, for the person as an adult to decide their gender. Man or Woman, or perhaps something else.
I'm personally not educated enough on the matter to know if there is a something else, but I honestly don't see why there couldn't be.
And again, this isn't about the bodies physical "sex" it's about gender which is all in our heads and our society. And if you think I'm attacking traditional values, I'm not saying gender is bad. I'm saying options are good and people shouldn't be beholden to Societies pearl clutching when it comes to a personal choice that affects no one but yourself.

WRITING.TITLE: 26 [M4R] Toronto - Friendship, romance and adventure. 10 reasons you should be my pal, 5 more why you should date me
WRITING.TEXT: [removed]

WRITING.TITLE: 26 [M4R] Friendship, romance and adventure. 10 reasons you should be my pal, 5 more why you should date me.
WRITING.TEXT:
First off, reasons you should be my pal.
1. I'm Nova Scotian, I've got a tiny accent and a huge alcohol tolerance.
1. I'm 6'3, you'll look like a badass with me in next too you. And I can help you hang things up high.
1. I'm a huge nerd. Comic books, video games, Tabletop you name it, I rock at it, and I love including people in my hobbies.
1. I'm an Amazing cook, and I love having people over. Just recently I hosted a small dinner with green onion stuffed, honey garlic glazed, Caribbean style pork roast as the center piece. There's a "Before" shot on my instagram, it was eaten too quickly to get an after shot.
1. I'm friendly and outgoing. Do you need a wingman? I've got your back. Do you want to ask the staff a question but you're kinda shy? I'm not! Do you want to compliment someone, I'll be happy to start a conversation so you can.
1. I love camping. We should camp some time. It'll be rad. Leave no trace is the only way!
1. Your pets/kids will love me. I'm fantastic at interacting with things smaller than me. If we become buddies, I also don't mind baby or pet sitting once in awhile.
1. I tell it like it is. I'm not one of those "I'm brutally honest" assholes who think honesty is an excuse to not be tactful, but I will speak up if something needs to be said, rather than let it linger.
1. I'm funny too. I've even written my own standup routine. I'd like to say I got a standing ovation when I preformed it. I didn't. But I'd like to say I did.
1. I'm super good at lists. Like the best.
1. I'm also super good at counting. This concludes the 10 reasons I'd be a bomb friend.
Now, as for romance. You should probably consider those first ten things, because let's face it. You've gotta be able to be friends with the person you're falling in love with eh?
1. I'll go shopping with you and actually help you pick out outfits I think you'd look nice in.
1. I'll make you breakfast in bed.
1. I'll take you dancing! (I mean, it's probably more for me. But I love dancing.)
1. I speak like a cheesy romance movie when I'm crushing on someone. For real, you'll find it as hilarious as you do sweet.
1. I'm an optimist. I'm more of a Tigger than an Eeyore, but he's cool too and I've always loved that Winnie and the gang always included him, just because he was down from time to time didn't mean he wasn't a good friend.
1. I'm 6'3. I know I said this before, but sometimes it's worth repeating. I'll make you feel tiny and safe even if you're near 6' feet yourself! If you're over 6', I'm not sure about tiny but I'll do my best to make you feel safe.
1. I'm like, super good at counting.
1. My instagram and gorgeous face https://www.instagram.com/keypaw/

Well my character didn't have any restraint. He was a junkie addicted to sadness. But he had to fall in love with these people to feel sadness at betraying them.
Everything he did was just so he could get his next fix.

They ressed both the Barb and his daughter. We all were level 20.
But, it was the only way my character could end that campaign.
Yup. That's why I made this guy, he just wanted to feel sad, and would do anything to feel that way, but he had to go to greater and greater lengths to do it.

WRITING.TITLE: [Question] Dear DnDers, the most maligned alignment is "Chaotic Evil". How would you make it work as a player?
WRITING.TEXT:
For me it was
**Parblick the Chaotic Evil Grey Gnome.**
Parlick was cursed early on in his life, when feeling sadness he'd get the same sensation as joy, when feeling joy he'd just feel numb. So, he ruined all of his personal relationships just to feel sad, but that quickly was not enough. He began murdering his estranged loved ones to feel pangs of loss.
Eventually he was discovered and run out of town, so he began adventuring. Going on small quests, defending towns etc, before murdering his brother's in arms.
Does this so much, it becomes harder and harder to become attached too people. Can no longer muster up love or affection, and thus no sadness upon their passing.
Joins up with adventuring party for epic campaign. After months and months of playing with them, bonding with them. They are able to reach through too him and bond with him. Becoming the truest friend's he's ever had. Decides not to betray them, continues on in the quest. Months of the numbness of joy slowly killing him.
Upon finally slaying the arch lich and saving the world, reuniting the Barbarian with his daughter, and returning too the bard his voice, the numbness is just too much. Parblick cannot breath, everything going dark.
Being unable to stand it, roll to kill little girl. Nat 20.
Other players at the table had no idea I was playing this character this way. Only DM knew. Barbarian beats me at initiative tries to kill me. Misses. Other's too stunned to take turns. Roll to attack Barbarian. Nat 20. The sadness is too exhilarating, never before has Parblick felt this good! Throw's self from tower so he never has to go another day without feeling like this. Thinks of all the loss he has left in his wake. Smiles.

WRITING.TITLE: Why I had fun getting stomped by Tempostorm on the PTR: Noobs Vs The Storm
WRITING.TEXT:
So me and a bunch of randoms, after 500 seconds in que on PTR got pitted against Tempo Storm, I'm mid gold-low plat consistantly as a player. Diamond on QM if you trust hotslog. I'm not at their level.
I was playing D.Va in a mirror match vs TScottie, who out played me. A little. But I killed Titan who was playing Valeera once, which was nice.
At one point Scottie and I (I can call him Scottie, we're bros now.) butted heads once with our D.Va Dashes and it made a bowling ball sound, which was cool.
But yeah, all in all. We were out played and defeated but I wasn't sad. I had so much fun being able to just try against these guys.
http://i.imgur.com/O8h5JXK.png
It was cool seeing how well they played together, and whenever I dodged a skill shot (Looking at you Javandus) I felt like a baller.
But to be fair I dived into the four of them without my team, a lot. We weren't super organized haha.
TempoStorm, if you ever want to play a best of 5 some time, I'd love to just get some guys together and have fun. At the end of the game I tossed my spray down, the floating hearts one, and it wasn't out of salt. It was out of affection. I'm sure it wasn't as fun for yo uas it was for us, but I had a ball.
Fingers crossed they stay cheap-ish

I'm all about improv as a DM. I come up with stuff like this all'a the time.
Literally haven't used one creature from the monster manual once lol

Get a bag of holding, the smallest size you can, enchant it to be immune to acid damage. Put lamp in it, swallow bag.
Rinse, literally and figuratively, and repeat each day.

Everytime she gets to a new town and asks for the book store, ask her what books she looks for.
Then roll a d6 for each type she asks about. She finds that many of that kind of book for sale, once she finds 10 of one kind of book (Don't tell her btw) she gains a +1 in checks for that knowledge. Like nature, arcane etc. Up to a max of +2.
If she get's a +2 in all the different kinds of knowledge, give her a +1 to her int score.
She's a druid, so none of these things are game breaking, but it's a fun way to let her know she IS growing.
Occasionally, let one of the books be magic and she can maybe learn a new cantrip? Or perhaps she finds two very slim journals that when you write in one you write in the other, up to a max of ten messages.
Oodles of things you could do for her like that.
Perhaps she finds a cursed book that pulls her and the party into the story and they must finish the book to escape, and that can be like a side quest. And if they find any copies of that book in the future, their exploits are now in every copy.
Like, if a dude was pulled into Lord of the rings with his Drone helicopter and he just like, flew the ring into mount doom. All copies in the world of the fellowship would be like, ten chapters long.
All kinds of things you can do.

I just want to clarify, that he's always introduced in a planned way. I don't use him as a Deus Ex Machina. Basically when he shows up, I make "golems" out of the random things around the stage.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tHqy0n_VQJc
"The Bard"
A Masked wander who seeks to make life more dramatic. With no loyalty he joins the side of whomever seems to be loosing, just to give them a fighting chance. His magic's allow him to make inanimate objects "Dance".
Because he want's to tilt the stage just enough in the direction that's most dramatic, the players have never fought him all out and they're always horrified/hopeful when he shows up. He's killed two of them and saved them from three TPKs.
Top Ten OP anime characters

Parblick the Chaotic Evil Grey Gnome.
Parlick was cursed early on in his life, when feeling sadness he'd get the same sensation as joy, when feeling joy he'd just feel numb. So, he ruined all of his personal relationships just to feel sad, but that quickly was not enough. He began murdering his estranged loved ones to feel pangs of loss.
Eventually he was discovered and run out of town, so he began adventuring. Going on small quests, defending towns etc, before murdering his brother's in arms.
Does this so much, it becomes harder and harder to become attached too people. Can no longer muster up love or affection, and thus no sadness upon their passing.
Joins up with adventuring party for epic campaign. After months and months of playing with them, bonding with them. They are able to reach through too him and bond with him. Becoming the truest friend's he's ever had. Decides not to betray them, continues on in the quest. Months of the numbness of joy slowly killing him.
Upon finally slaying the arch lich and saving the world, reuniting the Barbarian with his daughter, and returning too the bard his voice, the numbness is just too much. Parblick cannot breath, everything going dark.
Being unable to stand it, roll to kill little girl. Nat 20.
Other players at the table had no idea I was playing this character this way. Only DM knew. Barbarian beats me at initiative tries to kill me. Misses. Other's too stunned to take turns. Roll to attack Barbarian. Nat 20. The sadness is too exhilarating, never before has Parblick felt this good! Throw's self from tower so he never has to go another day without feeling like this. Zarya, take the grenade talent that is a quest, where you need to get a bunch of hits to finish it.
Take the grenade talent that makes the middle of the grenade do more damage
Take the Grenade talent at level 20 that gives all grenade stacks back too you.
Everything else, play with as you like.
But I like the shield two allies ability and the one that increases move speed for my melee assassins to chase. I also like the ability that let's you spend energy to make a new shield. After your first shield is gone people think you're defenseless and blow all their skills on you, this way you get to just absorb them.
Mastering the Grenade build, you'll be topping the damage for most of the game, trust me.
Hey, I'll play with you in Quickmatch if you want. I'm pretty decent at the game and can help you out.

Oh wow. They don't even include his name in the video description which I assumed they would.
Just her name.
Though google is clever, it might pick up on the connection between her name and his name, the old case and the new one, and present this in results when researching the case. In fact I'm almost positive if the case itself is googled this will turn up.

And that's what everyone is ignoring. She was 17! Scared of an abusive mother and she told what she though, was a lie without harm. But they found the guy, now she's in deep more and more scared.
I'm not saying let her off scott free, but the people who are calling for her to pay millions of dollars (Which she'd never ever be able too do) or to put her away for 25 years have obviously never been in an abusive enough situation that you'd say anything to avoid more abuse.
(For the record I think this sentencing was too small, as well as the 90 dollar compensation. But I'm no legal professional.)
Yeah, thanks to reddit that video will be at the top of any search for his name.
I mean, it's probably going to catch traction thanks to Reddit

Yeah. That's what people are missing here. She made up a lie that she didn't think would happen to protect herself from an abusive parent. She may have been a young adult at that time, but fear for oneself can drive you to do many things. Who knows what kind of abuse she lived through before this?
Do I think she should be absolved of all guilt? Of course not! She needs to be punished, and I think more harshly than this. This is bullshit, the man lost 4 of his best years to this lie and there's no way to bring that back.
But just because she made a huge fucking mistake, doesn't mean it wasn't a mistake. She was a scared young person who honestly thought the lie was harmless at first. She deserves a bigger punishment, but not this insane mob of internet "do gooders" who'd see her life ruined while teeming with this seething hatred.
Hate the justice system for allowing this kind of abuse.
Hate the judge for sentencing that man so harshly with no evidence other than one person's testimony.
Hate this judge for being so lenient in her sentencing.
But pity her. In her youth and her fear she told a lie and made a mistake that damaged someone's life. But she came forward. She never ever had to do that. She realized what she did was wrong, and maybe she was able to get out of that environment of fear and that's what empowered her to come forward.
I know people are going to pile on and hate on me for the sentiment that she too is a victim, but I will stand by anyone with abusive parents. "Oh but you're just taking her word about this like the judge did before about him assaulting her!" I am not! I'm not just taking her word. I'm taking her actions. **Why** would she come forward like that? She knew it was wrong. Why then would she make up another lie to compound that one during her truths? I feel her action of coming forward lends more weight to her testimony.
But obviously I could be wrong too. I could be very wrong. So, before you jump down my throat with your pitchforks I just want to say
It's not our job to mete out justice. Don't turn her into some villain when you don't know the whole story. Let the courts do their job, if you find it dissatisfactory, the judge is a public servant. Write letters to people in power and people above her and let it be known that this judge is not serving the public's will.
But if we vilify all criminal's forever, where then is the hope for rehabilitation? As important as justice and punishment is, so too is understanding and forgiveness.
I disagree with the sentencing, but I also disagree with burning her at the stake as some posters seem to be *metaphorically* suggesting

I know you said you didn't want to be a Caster, but Consider the Summoner Archtype where you wear your Eidlon like armour, then make your Eidolon materialize as your Junk swirling around you, and turn into a giant angry junk golem to fight. That'd be Ballin'.
And like, you can be super angry because you always need to pick up all the junk after the Eidolon dematerializes because he never puts it back.
That'd also be an intersting weakness if you wanted to play it extra hard. You cannot summon your Eidolon without sufficient junk to tempt it into the real world.
So yeah, you still get to play a smashy frontline brawler. Just a different flavour than you were thinking.

WRITING.TITLE: [Hero Concept] The Zerg Swarm -With talents being such an important part of Heroes of the Storm's Identity, I've conceptualized a hero defined not by their abilities, but by their talents!
WRITING.TEXT:
[The Zerg Swarm.](https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/0/930/941431-ss76_hires_1_.jpg) A terrifying force, known for it's lack of identity and all consuming way of life. Some say the most Iconic faces of the swarm are Kerrigan, Zagara, Abathur, even Dehaka. But no. These are individuals. These are the outliers. The swarm's Trillions of souls are of one mind and one purpose. Consume.
When the game Starts you have control of one Overlord, it cannot mount. Basic Move Speed, can move over terrain like Medivh's raven. It's Z is "Overlord Drop" On a 50 Second cooldown, "The Swarm" all enter's the Overlord. Pressing Z again drops all units over time.
It's abilities are
* "Baneling drop" drop four banelings beneath the Overlord, then explode.
* "Scourge Missle" In an arc (Think Zul'Jin's Double Axe throw) fire two scourge, they explode on impact. * Dark swarm. A defiler unburrows and drops a cloud reducing all attack range within too melee range. Has a set duration, or until Defiler * R1 - Super Changling - The Swarm Burrows and the Overlord drops a Changling that becomes a copy of target enemy hero within range. Upgrade's similar to Abathur's Ultimate Evolution. * R2 - OverSeer - The Overlord changes into an Overseer, gaining an Auto attack (Shut up it has one okay) and a trait you can trigger to resurrect, rounding up, half of each unit in your Swarm.
* Trait - "The Swarm" Passively spawn Two Zerglings with X respawn timers. Zerglings are worth 1/20th hero xp. Any Zerg units spawned via "The Swarm" are assigned a hot key (1 for the full swarm, 2 for the Overlord, 3 for the zerglings etc etc) All units with "The Swarm" must stay within the Overlord's Radius
Now then, most of the talents you get will add Zerg units to spawn via "The Swarm"
Let's play with level 1.
* "Zerg rush!" Gain four more Zerglings. * "Roach Approach" Gain Two Roaches * "Pneumatized Carapace" When using "Overlord Drop" gain movespeed.
As you level up, you'll get more and more options to get Zerglings, or roaches, eventually even things like Lurker's and maybe Pygmlisks.(Tiny Ultralisks)
This, I think, would really help capture what it feels like to play an RTS, while still playing a MoBA. Of course I like the idea of getting more upgrades that upgrade the Overlord and the Defiler. Like, maybe when casting Dark swarm after picking up the Plague upgrade, it also deals damage, or perhaps INSTEAD deals damage.
The idea of this character is also NOT that the Overlord is the hero, no. He's just part of the greater swarm. (Though I think having a talent on each level that does not produce a unit would be a good thing, so you could theoretically play him as a hero unit.)
This would take a lot of balancing of course but I think it could be super fun and well done.
Enemy has lots of AOE? Take upgrades that make you a better hero and five you bulky units for your swarm. Enemy has lots of ranged AA? Punish them by upgrading your Defiler. (Ooh maybe a talent that reduces all ability cast ranges too melee as well? For anti spell caster?)
Destroying the Overlord will cause "The Swarm" to all die as well. Kind of like a Misha Rexxar thing.
A talent that will upgrade one of your roaches too a ravager? A talent to upgrade a Hydra into a Lurker?
Level 20 talent ideas
* ZERG RUSH! "All Zerglings become swarmlings. For every two zerglings, gain an extra Zergling" (Earlier upgrades could include ingame zergling upgrades.)
* For the Swarm "The swarm now share's it's HP pool across all units. All damage taken is done too this single HP pool, upon 0 the Overlord dies." * Ultimate changling - Gain access too your opponent's chosen Ultimate. * Cerebrate - The Overseer gains more AA power, it's leash range is now Global and it's Z changes to a Falstadd like flight. (Gaining the effects of Pneumatized Carapace on landing if you chose it.)
[Bonus - In game depiction of "The Swarm" vs "The Swarm" Mirror match](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/carbotanimations/images/0/08/Scouting_overlords.gif/revision/latest?cb=20151210025755)

WRITING.TITLE: All this Hanamura hate, where's the love?
WRITING.TEXT: Hanamura might be my new favourite map! I play the TLV and those guys are mind bending on it, but even if you're not playing them, the map is so dynamic and you're always moving from point a to point b. It's the most engaging map in the game!

WRITING.TITLE: (Sort of spoilers for the most recent episode, but not really.) Archer's Opinion on Kreiger
WRITING.TEXT:
I've seen a lot of discussion about how since this is Archer's dream and it's all happening because of Archer's Subconcious, the characters are not quite themselves but more how Archer percvives them.
That would mean, despite all the jokes and shit they all make about Krieger being a weird scary Nazi, Archer consider's him one of the most clever and noble people he knows. because holy shit dream land Krieger is amazing.
While also still being weird and scary. But a fucking hero for sure. Pardon my German.

Amulet of gobeldy gook - while wearing you may only speak and understand goblin. Only a goblin may remove it for you.
Pocket shower - a square that when you place it on the ground extends into a shower, has a 1/20 chance of summoning an angry water elemental from the tap.
Circlet of potato speech - talk to plants as the spell, but only to potato's. They have strong opinions on how you should prepare them.
